peripheralPage.name: _instance
peripheralPage.template: \t//! Base value for PCR (excluding MUX value) \tstatic constexpr uint32_t defaultPcrValue = 0;\n\n

choiceOption.name: adc_cfg1_adiclk
choiceOption.toolTip: Selects the clock source for the module

choiceOption.name: adc_cfg1_adiv
choiceOption.toolTip: Selects the divide ratio used by the ADC to generate the internal clock ADCK.

floatOption.name: clockFrequency
floatOption.toolTip: Determined from clock source and prescaler

binaryOption.name: adc_cfg1_adlsmp
binaryOption.toolTip: Selects between different sample times based on the conversion mode selected\n Longer sample times are advantageous for high impedance sources and also reduces power consumption.

choiceOption.name: adc_cfg2_adlsts
choiceOption.toolTip: Selects between the extended sample times when long sample time is selected

binaryOption.name: adc_cfg2_adhsc
binaryOption.toolTip: Configures the ADC for high-speed clock operation by adding 2\n additional ADCK cycles to total conversion time

binaryOption.name: adc_cfg2_adacken
binaryOption.toolTip: Enables the ADC internal asynchronous clock source irrespective of ADC need.\n This reduces the initial delay at the start of a sequence of conversions.\n It also allows use of the ADC internal clock as a clock source for other peripherals

choiceOption.name: adc_sc2_refsel
choiceOption.toolTip: Selects the voltage reference source used for conversions.

binaryOption.name: adc_sc2_dmaen
binaryOption.toolTip: Enables use of DMA with ADC

choiceOption.name: adc_sc2_compare
choiceOption.toolTip: Enables comparison of ADC result with CV1 and CV2

intOption.name: low_comparison_value
intOption.toolTip: Low value for ADC automatic comparison\n This value is assumed unsigned

intOption.name: high_comparison_value
intOption.toolTip: High value for ADC automatic comparison\n This value is assumed unsigned

intOption.name: adc_cv1
intOption.toolTip: CV1 threshold value\n Either low or high value

intOption.name: adc_cv2
intOption.toolTip: CV2 threshold value\n Either low or high value

binaryOption.name: adc_sc2_adtrg
binaryOption.toolTip: Selects the type of trigger used for initiating a conversion
